titlestmt.titleproper: Business Records of Phillip M. Clarke, 1916-1933
titlestmt.author: Processed by Staff.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Business Records of Phillip M. Clarke, 1916-1933
did.abstract: Phillip M. Clarke, 1889-1963, was a business man, banker and rancher in Arizona. This collection contains a journal, ledger, and other records relating to cattle ranching, 1919-1924; a store at Ruby, Ariz., 1916-1918; and property and other investments in Southern Arizona.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.p: Business Records of Phillip M. Clarke (AZ 141). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 3 series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Journal, ledger, and other records relating to cattle ranching, 1919-1924; a store at Ruby, Ariz., 1916-1918; and property and other investments in Southern Arizona. The store journal provides detailed entries of customers and items sold.

item.subject: Retail trade -- Arizona -- Santa Cruz County.
